code: function s(e){if(Array.isArray(e))return e.map(e=>s(e));switch(e.type){case n.Literal:return e.value;case n.Argument:return[e.type,e.value];case n.Number:case n.Date:case n.Time:return[e.type,e.value,e.style];case n.Select:{let t={};for(let[n,r]of Object.entries(e.options))t[n]=s(r.value);return[e.type,e.value,t]}case n.Plural:{let t={};for(let[n,r]of Object.entries(e.options))t[n]=s(r.value);return[e.type,e.value,t,e.offset,e.pluralType]}case n.Pound:return[e.type];case n.Tag:return[e.type,e.value,s(e.children),s(e.control)]}}
